# VideoPlayerEvents.VideoComfortMitigationDidOccur

**Structure**

The system detects a video comfort violation and triggers the event along with the comfort mitigation action

## Declaration

```swift
struct VideoComfortMitigationDidOccur
```

## Instance Properties

- **comfortMitigation**: Video comfort mitigation action occurred

## Conforms To

- Event
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
